staff_pick.title: Sleep Essentials
staff_pick.discribe: Lie down, get cozy, close your eyes, and let these restful #sleepessentials do the work on guiding you to #dreamland. There's nothing to do, just listen, soften your body, and fall gently to #sleep. #nightynight

staff_pick.title: Ritual Matinal
staff_pick.discribe: As primeiras horas após o despertar definem o tom do restante do dia. Essa playlist foi desenvolvida para que você cultive uma atitude positiva e realize tudo o que pretende em seu novo e maravilhoso dia.

staff_pick.title: Saúde e Imunidade
staff_pick.discribe: Cada uma de nossas células possui uma poderosa energia de saúde. Desejamos que essas práticas ajudem-lhe a ativar e aprimorar essa energia para que você mantenha corpo e mente saudáveis e em harmonia.

staff_pick.title: Explore New Techniques
staff_pick.discribe: Go #beyondthefoundations of mindfulness and #meditation and #explore new ways to make friends with your mind. The techniques are all different but the goal is the same, getting to know who we really are. #inneradventures

staff_pick.title: The Power Of Visualization For Anxiety
staff_pick.discribe: #visualization can influence and forge our realities as we know it. Explore how to use this meditation technique to ease #anxiety. Read more on #insighttimerblog: “How Visualization Can Help Anxiety”

staff_pick.title: Mantras
staff_pick.discribe: Bellísimos #mantras, frases y sonidos que te ayudarán a tener foco, a #centrarte y a #calmar nuestra mente.

staff_pick.title: A Energia do Amor
staff_pick.discribe: O amor move o mundo. Permita que essa seleção de meditações preencha seu coração.

play_list.title: Français - Peace on Purpose
play_list.teacher: UN Foundation X Lululemon | Peace On Purpose
play_list.discribe: Peace on Purpose est un partenariat entre la UN Foundation et lululemon. Ces pratiques simples et fondées sur des données probantes permettent aux personnes qui répondent aux plus grands défis du monde à faire face à l’adversité, à l’uncertitude et aux #changements rapides.

play_list.title: S’endormir
play_list.discribe: Le sommeil est encore le seul moyen de récupérer nos capacités physiques et psychiques. En cela, il est indispensable à notre bien-être et savoir s’endormir est primordiale.

play_list.title: Chill Out
play_list.discribe: For anytime during the day there is a need for a mental break and chill out.. #calm #relax #ease #chillout #mentalbreak

play_list.title: Lâchez prise
play_list.discribe: #Lâcherprise c’est accepter ses limites! À force de vouloir contrôler tout ce qui nous entoure, nous gaspillons notre énergie et perdons notre #sérénité. Le lâcher-prise est une attitude intérieure d’ouverture inconditionnelle à la vie et aux autres. Ce n’est pas un renoncement mais l’acceptation de ce qui est en toute conscience.

play_list.title: A Energia do Amor
play_list.discribe: O amor move o mundo. Permita que essa seleção de meditações preencha seu coração.

play_list.title: Finding Your Purpose
play_list.discribe: Do you ever wonder what your #purpose in life is? Use these meditaitons to discover what you truly want, uncover your #gifts, find #direction and build the #confidence to get there. Come to live a #purposedrivenlife.

play_list.title: Mantras
play_list.discribe: Bellísimos #mantras, frases y sonidos que te ayudarán a tener foco, a #centrarte y a #calmar nuestra mente.

play_list.title: The Power Of Visualization For Anxiety
play_list.discribe: #visualization can influence and forge our realities as we know it. Explore how to use this meditation technique to ease #anxiety. Read more on #insighttimerblog: “How Visualization Can Help Anxiety”

play_list.title: SOS para Crises
play_list.discribe: Meditações capazes de auxiliar pessoas que estejam experimentando alguma crise de ansiedade.
